summary:
My name is Adelaida, I just moved to The Netherlands and I’m open to job offers as a UX/UI designer. I speak English and Russian.

After more than 10 years of work experience in various places such as flower companies, gift shops and being a freelance artist I decided to study UX/UI design and now I'm ready to work as a Product Designer. 
My education - The Interaction Design Foundation courses and Saint-Petersburg College of Trade and Economics, which I successfully graduated in 2011.
I'm a young passionate and self-driven UX/UI Designer who improves her skills every day, loves to learn and keeps abreast of everything related to user-centered design. 
In my work I use Design Thinking and User Research methodologies to solve the tasks and create products and solutions that are truly relevant to the target audience.
My background: photography, sculpting and art have shaped the creative mindset and helps me to think outside the box. 
My goal is to work in an agile team where I can demonstrate and hone my skills.


My skills:

- Prototyping websites and mobile interfaces
- Conducting Usability testing
- Building customer journey maps
- Creating Personas
- Conducting User Interviews 
- Empathy and communication
- Confident knowledge of tools like: Figma, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop
- Creating animation in Adobe AE 
- Creating websites with website builders like Wix, Tilda, etc.

Languages:

English, Russian
